overview: Casper Randall and Tyler Scott meet up in a café where they get into the mood by licking some cream and end up with a very creamed dessert which they both enjoy! Later Joel Tamir gets his eyes on a cute twink, Sasha, leaving his number on the bathroom mirror for Sasha to find, needless to say these two meet up and have fun! David Hollister brings home Johny, a cute twink that unfortunatly falls asleep waiting for David to make coffee! But David won't miss the oportunity, and gets into bed with him and wakes him up by kissing and licking every inch of the boys body before riding it like he never has before! Rodion has a date with Jim, but these two naughty boys have something else in mind when meeting at the café, after getting almost kicked out by the waiter who want's to close, they hide in the bathroom and their fun begins whilst waiting for the waiter to leave, only to fuck in the middle of the café where they were enjoying their pancake just moments before!
tagline: Staxus presents their latest release After Hours, where some of the cutest euro twinks hook up after a long night out!
title: After Hours!
